titles.title: Farming Opportunities Training and Outreach Grant Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
Farming Opportunities Training and Outreach Grant Program Reauthorization Act of 2023

A bill to amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to improve assistance for socially disadvantaged farmers and ranchers and veteran farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
